text: Brian Eno (born 15 May 1948) is an English musician. He was one of the original members of the band Roxy Music. He makes music called electronic music, which is music made using computers and other electronic devices, like the synthesizer. Brian Eno has worked with other famous musicians and groups like David Bowie and U2. == References == Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:English record producers Category:English rock musicians Category:British Grammy Award winners Category:Musicians from Suffolk
title: Brian Eno
